generate_simple_ode_data module¶

generate_simple_ode_data.create_data(num: int, func: Callable, timesteps: ndarray, dim: int)[source]¶

Create data for a simple ODE system.

Parameters:

num (int) – Number of trajectories to generate.

Returns:

Array of generated trajectories.

Return type:

array

generate_simple_ode_data.lotka_volterra(t, n)[source]¶

Differential equations for a Lotka-Volterra system with three predators and three prey.

Parameters:

  • t (float) – Time

  • n (array) – Array of concentrations of species p1, p2, p3, q1, q2, and q3.

Returns:

Array of the derivatives of the abundances of species p1, p2, p3, q1, q2, and q3.

Return type:

array

generate_simple_ode_data.main(args)[source]¶
generate_simple_ode_data.reaction(t, n)[source]¶

Differential equations for a simple chemical reaction system.

Parameters:

  • t (float) – Time

  • n (array) – Array of concentrations of species s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, and s6.

Returns:

Array of the derivatives of the abundances of species s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, and s6.

Return type:

array
